welcome.hello:
Good day. Please come in an sit down. 
Tell me, witch car do you want to buy ?

Hello there, I hear you want to buy a 
car. Witch type do you want ?

Good morning. You’ve come to the right 
place to buy a new car. Witch one do 
you want ?

Hello there, How are you ? I understand 
you want to buy a new car. Witch car do you want ?

Good day to you. What can I do you for 
then ? A car.... Witch type ?
Afternoon.... What car can I sell you then ....

Hi. I assume you want to buy a new set 
of wheels. What type do you want then ?

priceAnnounce.announce:
OK. The trade-in value on your old 
car is £MONEY. Your new 
MODEL is going to cost you 
£PRICE.

Alright.... I can give you £MONEY 
trade-in on your old car. Your new 
MODEL will cost you £PRICE.

That’s fine. I can let you have a 
MODEL for £PRICE. By 
the way your old rustbucket is worth 
0£MONEY.

OK. Your old car is worth £MONEY to me. 
I have a MODEL for 
sale at £PRICE.

Right, you can have one for £PRICE. You 
can have £MONEY for your old car 
as well....

I have just one MODEL 
left. A snip at £PRICE. I can let 
you have £MONEY for your old car.

Right then. I can advance you £MONEY on 
your old car in part exchange on a 
MODEL , a bargain at £PRICE.

An excellent choice. Cheap at £PRICE, 
and you can have £MONEY for your 
old car as well.

office.buy: OK. I’ll pay £PRICE for the car.

NotEnoughMoney:
Win some more races with your old 
car first, then maybe you’ll be able 
to afford a new one. Till then, 
get out !!!!

Right then, a deal's a dea.... Hey,
this money is short. Are you trying
to cheat me .... Get out of my office
before I call the police....'

When I say £MONEY, I mean £MONEY.
Out !!!!

No you won't, because you can't. Get
out, now !!!!

Do I look like a charity institution
? Leave my property immediately.

Stop wasting my time. You can't
 afford it. I you'd better go efore I get annoyed....

cash. If you want to try and cheat\people, become a car salesman, not aacing driver. Bye....'

OK. Here are the keys to your new
ca.... Hold on a minute, this money\is wrong. You can't afford the\car.... Stop wasting my time, and get
out !'

thanks: Alright.... Great to be of help. Byee....

OK. You’ve definitely got a bargain 
there.... See you....

OK. Thanks for the business, drive 
carefully....

I’m glad I could help you. Good 
luck in your next race....

Allright then, thanks for choosing 
my showroom. Good luck....

I love when a deal comes together. 
Glad to be of service....

Alright, I hope you and your new 
car are very happy together....

propositions.answer:
Try a spaceship to the moon, leaving 
now from somewhere not in my 
office.... Got the hint yet. OUT!

propositions.proposition: I’m afraid I left my wallet at home.
propositions.answer:
Then go home and get it, 
scatterbrain....

I don’t have to take these insults. 
Just get out, you childish idiot.

What do you want ? The shirt off my back ? 
I’ll teach you not to be so greedy ! 
Get out and don’t come back !!!!

propositions.proposition: Are you a Justin Bieber fan ?
propositions.answer:
8 out of 10 yankies prefer XXXXX. So do I. 
Get out, and never mention that name in my 
presence again.

Wellll.... Mr Boss-guy is throwing the hip 
ultra-cool racing driver out of his ‘digs’ 
coz I don’t like’ is attitude.

No problem. No new car !!!! 
Get out !

propositions.proposition: I used to know your father....
propositions.answer:
Did you ? Then you can forget buying a 
car from me. We’re not not exactly on 
speaking terms....
Well I can. Get out.
Not to mess around with small-talkers. Goodbye !
OUT !

What do you want, a medal ? 
Go back to the pub !
Then go elsewhere !!!!
heads you lose. Out !

propositions.proposition: I could murder a becon butty !
propositions.answer:
Euuuuuchh ! How can you eat meat ???? 
Get out of my office now, you animal.

ho ho ho. Ho ho ho indeed. Very boring. 
Please leave before I fall asleep.

propositions.proposition: I’d get a better deal from Al Capone!
propositions.answer:
Well go and see him and don’t bother me 
then, chile-chops.
Non. Je ne comprends pas. Allez vous en !

propositions.proposition: Are you going to sell me a car ?
propositions.answer:
As the famous philosopher, Bo-Wo-Dimly 
once said.... ‘No’. Bye.

Do you really want me to answer 
that one ???? Just go away, 
I ain’t selling....

OK. Then, drink cod liver oil. 
Just don’t come back here complaining....

propositions.proposition: You’re asking for a bunch of fives....
propositions.answer: Don’t threaten me.... Get out.

propositions.proposition: Hey, bug-brains, Cut the price some !
propositions.answer:
If there’s bugs in my brain, you 
better get out before you catch 
some of them !

propositions.proposition: I’m only a poor racing driver....
propositions.answer:
Win some more races with your old 
car first, then maybe you’ll be able 
to afford a new one. Till then, get out!!!!

propositions.proposition: Not in a month of Sundays....
propositions.answer:
Alright, in that case there’s nothing

safe ! I don’t like your tone of voice ! 
Get out !!!!

GET OUT OF MY OFFICE BEFORE THE SEARING

What are you trying to do with me ? 
My last offer was the lowest I could go. 
No deal. Bye.

1000 dollars. A bargain. Let’s go outside and

propositions.proposition: I hope you have a nice day....
propositions.answer:
I HOPE YOU GET RUN OVER BY A BUS. 
GET OUT THIS INSTANT
DON’T SHOUT AT ME !!!!OUT !

Well don’t let me keep you. 
See you when you’ve a little more time. 
Buying a car isn’t something that 
you should rush into.

She would go far....

propositions.proposition: Never. No way. Uh Uh. Not for dada.
propositions.answer: OK Mr. Negative. Good byee.
Out ! I don’t deal with rabbits....

propositions.proposition: There’s something funny going on. Is there....

propositions.proposition: Hmmm, I’d like to think about it !

propositions.proposition:

! *** *** ***** **** *** *** yourself !

? No way.... You’re driving.... I’m not

. I’m really a traffic warden, and your

you mean little rat....
